title: Swat 4 Title Font
content:
I was wondering if anyone knew what type of font was used for the title of Swat4.

This font seems basic, except for the "S" and "T" that seem to be unique and I've had a hard time finding a font that looks like them.

Heres a link for the pic:  
(sry best I could get the pic to look)

[http://img174.echo.cx/img174/2029/swat4logopic3bi.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20100806171149/http:/img174.echo.cx/img174/2029/swat4logopic3bi.jpg "http://img174.echo.cx/img174/2029/swat4logopic3bi.jpg")

Any font that could get close to this would work for me as well,  
thanks in advance for any help you can give.
author: Zod357

comments.content:
Jake,

This isn't quite it, but pretty close:  
 [Teuton Fett Bold Italic](http://web.archive.org/web/20100806171149/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/storm/teuton/fett-bold-italic/testdrive.html?s=SWAT4&p=72)

Stephen,

I would've linked to FontShop, but you don't sell the typeface.
